entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
